snippet: The British news media identified a 73-year-old man arrested in April but not named by the police as Jimmy Tarbuck, an entertainer and quiz-show host.
abstract: Entertainer and quiz show host Jimmy Tarbuck is identified by British media as having been arrested in growing sex abuse scandal in April, latest television personality to be accused of such crimes; Tarbuck is suspected of having abused young boy in 1970s.
lead_paragraph: The British news media identified a 73-year-old man arrested in April but not named by the police as Jimmy Tarbuck, an entertainer and quiz-show host.

headline.seo: British TV Star Jimmy Tarbuck Identified in Child Sex Inquiry
headline.main: Another British TV Personality Is Identified in Child Sex Investigation
headline.print_headline: British TV Personality Named in Child Sexual Abuse Case
